org.uclab.mm.icl.llc.LLCRecognizer

Class LLCRecognizer<InputDataType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.uclab.mm.icl.llc.LLCRecognizer.LLCRecognizer<InputDataType>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivityRecognizer, AudioEmotionRecognizer, AudioEmotionRecognizerV, GPSLocationRecognizer, InertialActivityRecognizer, VideoActivityRecognizer

    public abstract class LLCRecognizer<InputDataType>
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic interface of the recognizers used in ICL
    Author:
    Nailbrainz

    • Method Detail

      • ConsumeData

        public abstract void ConsumeData(SensorType it,
                                 SensorData obj)
        With this method, each child recognizer can receive Data sent from each sensor. It depends on each child class to whether consume the data or do nothing.
        Parameters:
        it - Type of sensor sending the data
        obj - Data that sensor sends

      • getType

        public abstract RecognizerType getType()
        Returns the RecognizerType of the current instance
        Returns:
        RecognizerType of the current instance

      • recognize

        public abstract ContextLabel recognize(InputDataType input,
                                       long userID,
                                       java.lang.String timeStamp)
        Recognizes the low level context. Recognition methodology is dependent on each child class.
        Parameters:
        input - Input data
        userID - userID of the llc
        timeStamp - time of the llc
        Returns:
        recognized low level context, in ContextLabel instance

      • getRunnable

        public abstract java.lang.Runnable getRunnable(java.lang.Long userID,
                                               java.lang.String timeStamp,
                                               MajorityVoting unifier)

      • getDataTypes

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<SensorType> getDataTypes()

      • isThreasholdReached

        public abstract boolean isThreasholdReached()
